spec_data.Name: perl-HTTP-ProxyAutoConfig
spec_data.Description:
HTTP::ProxyAutoConfig allows perl scripts that need to access the Internet
to determine whether to do so via a proxy server. To do this, it uses proxy
settings provided by an IT department, either on the Web or in a browser's
.pac file on disk.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:17:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Use a .pac or wpad.dat file to get proxy information
